project_abstract.cdata: The Karamay Petroleum Project will assist the Government and KOC in exploring and evaluating the potential of the Karamay oilfield, evolving the optimum method of recovering heavy oil, and undertaking a study on utilizing gas from the South China Sea. It will include high resolution and three dimensional seismic surveys, drilling of about 530 exploration/appraisal wells, and designing and carrying out pilot projects for heavy oil recovery. An important objective of the project is to introduce modern technology and methods to the petroleum industry in China, expanding the process initiated under the first two Bank-financed petroleum projects in the country for exploration strategy and heavy oil recovery. The project will provide improvement of techniques and equipment utilized in the evaluation of oil bearing formations, upgrading of the seismic data processing center at Urumqi and the computer center at Karamay, establishment of a training center and technical assistance. The major benefits from the project are the prospect of establishing additional light oil reserves and the potential for heavy oil, evaluating the viability of recovering heavy oil by appropriate thermal processes, possible optimization of gas use in Southern China, and transfer of technology.

P003423.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>克拉玛依石油项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将协助新疆自治区政府和克拉玛依石油公司探测并评估克拉玛依油田的潜力，完善回收重油的好方法，开展一项关于利用南海天然气的研究。项目内容包括进行高分辨率和三维地震勘测、开钻约530口探测井或评估井，设计并实施重油回收试点项目。本项目的一项重要目标是向中国石油行业推介现代技术和方法。扩大头两个世行对华贷款石油项目下启动的石油开发战略实施和重油回收规模。本项目将资助以下内容：（1）改进含油层评价过程中使用的方法和设备；（2）对设在乌鲁木齐的地震数据处理中心和设在克拉玛依的计算机中心进行升级改造；（3）建立培训中心；（4）提供技术援助。本项目的主要效益是建立新增轻油储备和重油潜力、评估通过适用热力流程回收重油的可行性、优化利用南海天然气以及技术转让的前景良好。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
